title: Crispy Fried Chicken Recipe
directions: Fill a Dutch oven fitted with a candy thermometer with vegetable oil until 2 to 3" deep, then preheat until oil reaches 350ยบ. Prepare one sheet pan lined with paper towels and a wire rack.
Place chicken on another sheet pan and dry thoroughly with paper towels. Cut chicken breast in half to make similar in size to other pieces and season with salt all over. Set aside.

In a large, deep bowl, combine flour, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. In a large bowl, beat eggs with 2 tablespoons water. Using tongs, place chicken in egg mixture, roll in flour mixture, and shake off excess. Fry chicken in 2 batches until golden brown and cooked through, 6 to 8 minutes (internal temperature should read 165ยบ). Bring oil back to 350ยบ before adding last batch.
Place chicken on wire rack to cool and sprinkle with flaky sea salt immediately.
Mix honey and Dijon mustard in a small bowl. Serve fried chicken with honey Dijon sauce.
Judy Kim is a NYC-based food stylist, recip
ingredients: Mix of bone-in chicken thighs, breasts, and drumsticks (about 2 lbs.)
